fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Throw an overwhelming amount of darts at someone, killing them ten times and denying them any other night feedback.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**Robo Monkey** (Requirement: Be attacked once)
- You may attack two people every night. Your attack and defense are upgraded to Powerful.
- You gain Roleblock and Redirect immunity.
**Sun Temple** (Requirement: Kill five people and be the last Monkey alive)
- You may summon the Sun God. This grants you the attack, defense, abilities, and attributes of (1479) Pestilence (But Accustomed To GIM). It will be revealed that "The Sun God has awoken!"
------------------------------
- You are so super that in balanced role lists, you take up two Monkey slots. The other slot is rerolled into an Any.
- You have an Invincible autovest.
